title: 3-in-1 Safety Tester
subtitle: 2 models: WK3210B and WK3210C

paragraphs: The WK 3210 Series is a comprehensive 3-in-1 tester, designed to perform AC, DC, and Insulation Resistance (IR) tests. Equipped with features that meet various international safety standards such as UL, CSA, TÜV, VDE, and CE, the WK 3210 Series is an ideal solution for thorough and reliable safety testing.

applications: Safety compliance testing in manufacturing and development environments
Routine and complex testing tasks in electrical equipment and component testing labs
Quality assurance processes where safety and compliance are critical

features.title: Versatile Testing Functions
features.description: Offers AC, DC, and IR testing capabilities, ensuring comprehensive coverage of safety testing requirements

features.title: Advanced Detection
features.description: Includes ARC Detection as a standard function to identify discharge faults, enhancing testing accuracy and safety

features.title: High-Speed Performance
features.description: Achieves a fast cut-off time of 0.4ms, optimizing testing efficiency and throughput

features.title: Extensive Memory Capacity
features.description: Features 100 sets of memory, with each memory set allowing up to 9 different test parameters

features.title: Multiple Phase Ports
features.description: The WK3210B model offers 2 phase ports, while the WK3210C model provides 8 phase ports, catering to a range of testing needs

specifications.heading: Arc Detection
content: Function: 0.01 mA/ Steps (0.0 mA is OFF)

specifications.heading: Test Time
content: 0.5 ~ 999.9 Sec (±20 mS), 0.1 sec/ Steps (0.0 sec is OFF)

specifications.heading: Ramp Up Time
content: 0.1 ~ 999.9 Sec (±20 mS), 0.1 sec/ Steps (0.0 sec is OFF)

specifications.heading: Judgement
content: HI-limit: 0.10 ~ 15.00mA, Digital setting (4 digits), 0.001 mA / Steps
LO-limit: 0.05 ~ 7.50mA, Digital setting (4 digits), 0.001 mA / (0.5 ~ 7.50mA), 0.01 mA Steps
Arc Detection: 0.5mA ~ 15mA / Steps (LO-limit & Arc Detection setting 0.0mA is OFF)

specifications.heading: Test Modes
content: Auto Test: Up to 9 test steps with different test parameters
Single Test: Execution withstanding voltage test or insulation resistance test
Auto Scanning: Linked with Scan Box, it performs Test auto test for objects having two or more points

specifications.heading: Display
content: 240x64 Dot Graphic LCM, CFL back light display

specifications.heading: Signal Output
content: PASS, FAIL, and TEST with relay contact signal

specifications.heading: Memory Storage
content: 01 to 99, 99 sets of memory, each set of memory includes 9 steps

specifications.heading: Interlock Function
content: The test voltage cannot be generated unless the interlock input terminal is short-circuited

specifications.heading: Power Requirement
content: Power Consumption: When no-load: < 70 VA, When with Rated Load: > 300 VA

specifications.heading: Accessories
content: Operation Manual, Power cord, 3P-2P AC adapter plug, High test lead wire / 1 meter long, 2A Fuse / fast blow (in fuse holder), Certificate of calibration
